title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1931.4 - Disclosure requirements of eligible applicants
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1931.4 - Disclosure requirements of eligible applicants

State Regulations

The corporation shall require in its list of conditions
that the eligible applicant submit, in a form developed by the corporation, the
names, addresses and business backgrounds of the principals involved and the
nature of their fiduciary and financial relationships to the project and each
other, whether past, present or future. The eligible applicant will update the
information upon any change. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1931.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
